title.narrative: Partnership for Support to the Implementation of Ugandas National Development Plans

description.narrative: \The objectives of the Trust Fund are to support the Republic of Uganda's ministries, departments and agencies to implement the country development strategy of inclusive and sustainable growth, socio-economic transformation and sustainable exit from dependence on aid.
